summary: Provides a GPU-accelerated implementation of sparse matrices in coordinate (COO) format, supporting creation from existing data, shape queries, data manipulation, conversion to other sparse formats, and basic operations such as transposition, while maintaining compatibility with the SciPy sparse API.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance scientific and machine‑learning workloads on NVIDIA GPUs by offering efficient COO sparse matrix handling and interoperability within the CuPy ecosystem.
